doc.title: Byala cherkva - prikazka za zemyata
doc.plot: 65-year-old Peyo Georgiev from Byala cherkva works on 800 decares of land taken on lease. He is ready to cultivate twice as much as that but confronts the pseudo-cooperations, which have seized all the land. An incorrigible optimist for whom no natural disasters, poor market, expensive fertilizers and equipment exist, uncle Peyo starts a struggle with all means...
